channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Police Step Up Patrols on Metro Networks After Taichung Stabbing
item.description: Police are stepping up patrols on Taiwan's metro networks after a stabbing on Taichung's metro.

item.title: Environment Minister Pledges New Policies To Help Industries Reach Eco Goals
item.description: New Environment Minister Peng Chi-ming says he's keen on using a carrot-and-stick approach in his new policies, helping industries reach their carbon goals while giving them some b

item.title: Fresh Protests Against Legislative Reforms Planned for Friday
item.description: More protests are planned outside of Taiwan's legislature this Friday after a huge gathering earlier in the week. Protesters oppose reforms proposed by the opposition-controlled le

item.title: Taiwan's New President Reignites Old Debate About Its Constitution
item.description: The inaugural speech by Taiwan's new President Lai Ching-te has reignited debate about the meaning of Taiwan's constitution and how it relates to China.
